page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF contd
page.content: {RORY SIMPSON-AGE 9. {7.45-}Gets up-washes.{7.50-}Has break- fast.{8.30-}Walks to school,plays until{9.15}when school goes in.{9.20- Register,homework handed in.{9.25-} Prayer. Report so far.{9.30-}Maths. {10am-}Test corrections.{10.35-}Book review.{11am-}Break.{11.15-}Poetry sheet.{12.40-}Washes hands.{12.45 School lunch. {1.45-}Watches girls dance.{2.15-}Music Times-TV. {2.40- Gym.{3.10-}Domesday Project-discussion {3.20-}Story.{3.30-}School dismissed. {3.58-}Gets home. {4.15-}Has meal. {5.15-}Boys Brigade. {7pm-}Home has snack. {8pm-}Watches TV. {9pm-}Gets ready for and goes to bed.
